mapper.insert: insert into game_image(game_no, origin_file_name, stored_file_name, is_thumbnail) values (#{gameNo}, #{originFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{isThumbnail})
mapper.delete: delete from game_image where file_no = #{fileNo} limit 1
mapper.select: select * from game_image order by 1 asc
